name: Assimilate (Shaydaio)
description:
Made for Brackey's game jam. Fits the theme of "Stronger Together" because the goal is to assimilate the city to defeat the monster. Therefore, stronger together. 

Credit:

Programming & Design: Zac Brennan
Voice: Sindanez

Outside Assets:
Cars & Bus Models: MYXERMAN
Human Models: MONARCHSHIELD
Monster Model: VADIM ZIAMBNETOV
Building Models: 255 pixel studios
Slime Material: Dmitry Chalovskiy
